articles.title: Tech wrap May 30: Lava Yuva 5G launched, Apple tests AI-powered Siri, more - Business Standard
articles.description: Lava Yuva 5G: Lava launched budget 5G smartphone Yuva in India. Apple has been testing ChatGPT integrated Siri assistant since 2023. OpenAI makes ChatGPT-4o's advanced tools available to users in free tier
